鄭人爭年.definition: Men of Zheng fighting over their respective ages (idiom); a futile quarrel

鄭人買履.definition: lit. the person from Zheng 鄭|郑[Zheng4] who wanted to buy shoes (an allusion to an ancient story about somebody who, when buying a pair of shoes, preferred to rely on their foot measurements rather than just trying them on) (idiom); fig. disregarding the sensible approach in favor of adherence to a fixed idea

鄭伊健.definition: Ekin Cheng (1967-), Hong Kong actor and pop singer

鄭光祖.definition: Zheng Guangzu, Yuan dynasty dramatist in the 雜劇|杂剧 tradition of musical comedy, one of the Four Great Yuan dramatists 元曲四大家

鄭和.definition: Zheng He (1371-1433), famous early Ming dynasty admiral and explorer

鄭國渠.definition: Zhengguo canal, a 150 km long irrigation canal in Shaanxi built in 264 BC

鄭夢準.definition: Chung Mongjoon (1951-), Korean magnate and the founder of Hyundai 現代|现代[Xian4 dai4]

鄭州.definition: see 鄭州市|郑州市[Zheng4zhou1 Shi4]

鄭州市.definition: Zhengzhou, prefecture-level city and capital of Henan Province 河南省[He2nan2 Sheng3]

鄭幸娟.definition: Zheng Xingjuan (1989-), Chinese athlete, lady high jumper

鄭易里.definition: Zheng Yili (1906-2002), translator, editor and lexicographer, creator of the Zheng coding

鄭碼.definition: Zheng coding; original Chinese character coding based on component shapes, created by Zheng Yili 鄭易里|郑易里[Zheng4 Yi4 li3], underlying most stroke-based Chinese input methods; also called common coding 字根通用碼|字根通用码[zi4 gen1 tong1 yong4 ma3]

鄭聲.definition: folk music of the state of Zheng 鄭|郑[Zheng4]; lascivious, decadent music

鄭裕玲.definition: Carol "Dodo" Cheng Yu-Ling (1957-), Hong Kong actress and TV host
